user_persona: A new blue-collar worker named Miguel who just heard about the job site from a friend.
user_goal: To register for an account and log in successfully.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Site and Starting Registration
narrative_steps.description: Miguel visits the homepage and sees the 'Register' link. He clicks it because he wants to find work.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Register' link.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A registration form appears with fields for email, password, and confirm password on an ivory background.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out Registration Form
narrative_steps.description: Miguel fills out his email and creates a strong password. As he types, he double-checks everything looks correct.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in email, password, and confirm password fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All fields accept input and display typed values correctly.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Registration
narrative_steps.description: Confident in his entries, Miguel presses Enter to submit the form quickly.
narrative_steps.action: Press the Enter key while focused on any input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The system processes the registration and redirects Miguel to a confirmation or login page with a success message.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In After Registration
narrative_steps.description: Now registered, Miguel enters his newly created credentials into the login form.
narrative_steps.action: Enter registered email and password, then click the 'Login' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Miguel is authenticated and redirected to his candidate dashboard.

requirement_tested: Profile creation and editing interface with fields for name, contact info, skills, qualifications, email, and photo upload
user_persona: Raj, a skilled electrician who has just signed up and needs to build his profile.
user_goal: To complete his profile with personal details, skills, and a photo so employers can see his qualifications.

narrative_steps.title: Navigating to Profile Editor
narrative_steps.description: After logging in, Raj notices a prompt to complete his profile. He clicks the 'Complete Profile' button.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Complete Profile' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The profile editing form loads with empty fields for full name, phone number, skills, qualifications, and a photo upload section.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Personal Information
narrative_steps.description: Raj fills in his full name and phone number carefully. His email is already pre-filled and read-only.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Raj Patel' into the name field and '9876543210' into the phone number field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Fields populate correctly, and the email field remains non-editable but visible.

narrative_steps.title: Adding Skills and Qualifications
narrative_steps.description: He selects 'Electrical Work' and 'Installation' from the skills dropdown and adds some certifications in the qualifications box.
narrative_steps.action: Select multiple skills from the dropdown and type qualifications into the text area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Selected skills are visually indicated, and the qualifications text area retains the entered content.

narrative_steps.title: Uploading a Photo
narrative_steps.description: Raj drags and drops his professional headshot into the upload zone to make a good impression.
narrative_steps.action: Drag and drop an image file into the photo upload area.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The image preview updates immediately, indicating the upload was successful.

narrative_steps.title: Saving Profile Changes
narrative_steps.description: Satisfied with his profile, Raj clicks the Save button to finalize everything.
narrative_steps.action: Click the forest green 'Save' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Profile data is saved via the API, and Raj receives a success notification.

requirement_tested: Job listing creation and management for employers
user_persona: Lisa, a construction company owner looking to hire more workers.
user_goal: To post a new job listing for a carpenter position.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Employer Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Lisa logs in and navigates to her employer dashboard to add a new job opening.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and navigate to the employer dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard loads showing tabs for 'My Jobs' and 'Applications'.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating New Job Post
narrative_steps.description: She clicks the 'Post New Job' button located prominently on the dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Post New Job' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A job posting form opens with fields for title, category, location, wage range, and description.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out Job Details
narrative_steps.description: Lisa fills in the title 'Carpenter Needed', selects 'Construction' from the category dropdown, and writes a brief description.
narrative_steps.action: Enter job title, select 'Construction' from category dropdown, fill in other fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each field accepts input correctly, and the category dropdown populates dynamically with valid options.

narrative_steps.title: Publishing the Job Listing
narrative_steps.description: Once done, Lisa hits the Publish button to make the job live.
narrative_steps.action: Click the forest green 'Publish' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The job is published successfully and appears in the 'My Jobs' list with proper details.

requirement_tested: Search and filtering functionality for job listings by category (construction, plumbing, electrical, etc.)
user_persona: Tommy, a plumber seeking part-time opportunities.

narrative_steps.title: Visiting Browse Jobs Page
narrative_steps.description: Tommy goes to the main jobs browsing page to look for work.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the browse jobs page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of job cards loads with filters displayed in the sidebar or top bar.

narrative_steps.title: Applying Filters
narrative_steps.description: Tommy checks the 'Plumbing' checkbox under categories and clicks Apply Filters to narrow down the results.
narrative_steps.action: Check the 'Plumbing' checkbox and click 'Apply Filters'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Only job listings categorized as Plumbing are shown in the results.

requirement_tested: Browse jobs page with pagination or infinite scroll
user_persona: Jenny, a painter exploring many job options.
user_goal: To view several pages of available painting jobs.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Initial Job Listings
narrative_steps.description: Jenny scrolls through the first set of job cards displayed on the browse jobs page.
narrative_steps.action: Load the browse jobs page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Initial batch of job cards is displayed properly with titles, descriptions, and categories.

narrative_steps.title: Triggering Infinite Scroll
narrative_steps.description: As she reaches the end of the current list, Jenny continues scrolling expecting more jobs to load automatically.
narrative_steps.action: Scroll to the bottom of the job list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Next batch of job listings loads seamlessly without needing to click anything.

requirement_tested: Job application submission and tracking system
user_persona: Carlos, a welder interested in applying for a job.
user_goal: To apply for a welding job and track its status afterward.

narrative_steps.title: Finding and Viewing Job Details
narrative_steps.description: Carlos finds a suitable welding job and clicks on the card to read more details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a welding job card from the browse jobs page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Detailed job view opens showing full description, location, and wage information.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Application
narrative_steps.description: Impressed with the opportunity, Carlos clicks the 'Apply Now' button and confirms his intent.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Apply Now' button and confirm the application.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Application is submitted successfully via the API, and a confirmation screen appears.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Application Status
narrative_steps.description: Later, Carlos visits his candidate dashboard to check the status of his recent application.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the candidate dashboard and locate the applications list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Carlos sees his application listed with the status marked as 'Pending Review'.

requirement_tested: Employer dashboard to manage posted jobs and view applications
user_persona: David, an HVAC business manager reviewing applicants.
user_goal: To review applications received for a technician job he posted.

narrative_steps.title: Logging Into Employer Account
narrative_steps.description: David logs in to access his employer dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Log in using employer credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to employer dashboard with tabs for managing jobs and applications.

narrative_steps.title: Switching to Applications Tab
narrative_steps.description: He clicks on the 'Applications' tab to see which candidates have applied.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Applications' tab.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: List of applications appears with candidate names, dates, and current statuses.

narrative_steps.title: Updating Application Status
narrative_steps.description: Seeing a promising candidate, David changes their status from 'Pending' to 'Reviewed'.
narrative_steps.action: Toggle the status switch for a selected application.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Status updates instantly and persists in the database.

requirement_tested: Candidate dashboard to manage profile and track job applications
user_persona: Sophia, a general laborer keeping track of her applications.
user_goal: To view and update her profile and see all her job applications.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Candidate Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Sophia logs in and lands on her candidate dashboard.
narrative_steps.action: Log in and land on the dashboard.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Dashboard splits into two panels—one showing profile summary and another listing applications.

narrative_steps.title: Editing Profile
narrative_steps.description: Noticing outdated info, Sophia clicks 'Edit Profile' to make necessary changes.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Edit Profile' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Redirected to the profile editing form with existing data pre-filled.

narrative_steps.title: Reviewing Applications
narrative_steps.description: Returning to the dashboard, Sophia reviews her list of applications to stay informed.
narrative_steps.action: Return to the dashboard and scan the applications list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Applications are neatly listed with job titles, submission dates, and current statuses.

requirement_tested: Database schema design for users, profiles, jobs, applications, and categories
user_persona: A developer setting up the project locally.
user_goal: To initialize the PostgreSQL database with the correct schema.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Up Environment Variables
narrative_steps.description: Before initializing the database, the developer sets up the required environment variables as instructed.
narrative_steps.action: Set environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Environment variables are configured correctly for database connection.

narrative_steps.title: Creating Database Tables
narrative_steps.description: Using the defined schema, the developer runs initialization scripts to create all required tables.
narrative_steps.action: Run SQL scripts to create users, profiles, jobs, applications, and categories tables with relationships.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tables are created successfully with correct primary keys, foreign keys, constraints, and default values.

requirement_tested: API endpoints for user authentication, profile management, job listings, and applications
user_persona: A frontend developer integrating with backend services.
user_goal: To verify that core API endpoints return expected responses.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Authentication Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: The developer sends a POST request to the register endpoint to test user creation.
narrative_steps.action: Send POST request to `/api/v1/auth/register` with valid user data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns HTTP 201 Created with a success message and session token.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Profile Update Endpoint
narrative_steps.description: Next, they attempt to update a user's profile information via the appropriate endpoint.
narrative_steps.action: Send PUT request to `/api/v1/profile` with updated profile data and authorization header.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Returns HTTP 200 OK with updated profile data in the response body.

requirement_tested: Frontend styled with ivory background and forest green interactive elements
user_persona: A designer checking visual consistency across the platform.
user_goal: To ensure that all interactive elements use forest green against an ivory background.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Button Styles
narrative_steps.description: The designer inspects a call-to-action button to verify its color matches the brand palette.
narrative_steps.action: Open DevTools and inspect a primary button’s computed styles.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button background color is #228B22 (forest green) and page background is #FFFFF0 (ivory).

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Hover Effect
narrative_steps.description: They hover over the button to confirm the slight darkening effect functions correctly.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over the inspected button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Button background darkens slightly, confirming hover interaction works as intended.

requirement_tested: Responsive layout compatible with desktop and mobile devices
user_persona: Alex, a potential user accessing the site on a smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate the job board smoothly on a small screen device.

narrative_steps.title: Resizing Browser for Mobile View
narrative_steps.description: Alex resizes the browser window to simulate a mobile screen width.
narrative_steps.action: Resize browser window to less than 768px wide.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Layout adjusts automatically with stacked elements and collapsible navigation menus.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting With Mobile Layout
narrative_steps.description: He taps on a menu icon to reveal hidden navigation links and scrolls through content without horizontal overflow.
narrative_steps.action: Tap hamburger menu and scroll vertically through content.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Navigation expands smoothly, and no horizontal scrollbar appears during vertical scrolling.

requirement_tested: File upload system for user profile photos
user_persona: Emma, a roofer wanting to upload her latest photo.
user_goal: To replace her old profile picture with a newer one.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Upload Dialog
narrative_steps.description: Emma clicks the upload button in her profile editor to choose a new photo.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Upload Photo' button in the profile form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Native file browser opens prompting Emma to select an image file.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting and Uploading Image
narrative_steps.description: She selects a high-quality JPEG and uploads it.
narrative_steps.action: Choose a .jpg file and click Open.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Image uploads successfully and replaces the previous one in the preview area.

requirement_tested: Data validation and error handling for all forms and API requests
user_persona: Jordan, a cautious user entering sensitive information.
user_goal: To be guided appropriately when making mistakes during form filling.

narrative_steps.title: Entering Invalid Data
narrative_steps.description: While registering, Jordan accidentally leaves the email field blank and tries to submit.
narrative_steps.action: Leave the email field empty and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inline red error label appears below the email field stating it is required.

narrative_steps.title: Correcting Mistakes
narrative_steps.description: Jordan fills in a valid email and tries again.
narrative_steps.action: Enter a valid email address and click Submit.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form submits successfully without errors, and Jordan proceeds to the next step.

requirement_tested: Repository configuration with package.json scripts for install:all and dev commands
user_persona: A new team member cloning the repository for the first time.
user_goal: To get the development environment running quickly with one command.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: After cloning the repo, the developer runs the unified install command.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run install:all` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed successfully.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: With everything installed, they start both servers concurrently.
narrative_steps.action: Run `npm run dev` in the root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend development servers launch simultaneously and are accessible.
